channel.title: Guestion for Richscape users!
channel.description: How many of you know how to make npc's talk (talk to) or setting dialogue to em. please help me if u know. coz in other sources i set dialogue from the client.java. But i cannot find the dialogues or the correct first click from the richscape client. plz help,ty.
